sentences.en: As parts of the world become uninhabitable, millions of people will try to migrate to more hospitable areas.
sentences.cn: 随着世界的一些地方变得不适人居，数以百万计的人将会试图迁移到环境更加宜人的地区。

sentences.en: For years the hospitable Blackwell's had been his winter quarters.
sentences.cn: 多年来,好客的布莱克韦尔岛的监狱一直是索比冬天的寓所.

sentences.en: He was very hospitable to me when I came to New York.
sentences.cn: 我来到纽约时，他对我很热情周到。

sentences.en: Her neighbours spoke of her as kindly and hospitable.
sentences.cn: 她的邻居都说她和蔼可亲、热情好客.

sentences.en: His very clothes seemed to partake of his hospitable nature.
sentences.cn: 他这身装束似乎显示了他的好客.

sentences.en: I asked, hospitable still, but not exactly effusive.
sentences.cn: 我依然殷勤地问道, 但已不是那么曲意逢迎了.

sentences.en: She encouraged the hospitable impulse and promised in advance to hurl herself into the fray.
sentences.cn: 她赞赏这种殷勤好客的热诚,而且先行表示,她一定要痛痛快快玩一下.

sentences.en: The great earth makes herself hospitable with the help of the grass.
sentences.cn: 大地借助于绿草,显出她自己的殷勤好客.

sentences.en: The hospitable host had his spare room emptied very quickly for the honoured guest.
sentences.cn: 好客的主人很快为尊贵的客人腾空了闲置着的房间.

sentences.en: The local people are very hospitable to strangers.
sentences.cn: 当地人对外来客人十分友好热情。

sentences.en: The local people were very kind and hospitable.
The locals are hospitable and welcoming.
The man is very hospitable; he keeps open house for his friends and fellow - workers.
sentences.cn: 那人十分好客,无论是他的朋友还是同事, 他都盛情接待.

sentences.en: The Ocean, that hospitable friend to the wretched, opened her capacious arms to receive Jones.
sentences.cn: 海洋, 这个不幸者的慷慨好客的朋友, 向琼斯张开了宽大的臂膀.

sentences.en: These savages were usually friendly, courteous, and hospitable.
sentences.cn: 这些野蛮人通常是友善, 谦恭和好客的.

words.tran_cn: 招待周到地；亲切地；善于款待地

trans.tran_cn: 好客的，热情友好的，（气候，环境）宜人的
trans.tran_en: friendly, welcoming, and generous to visitors
